hero.subtitle: Aging with Joy
hero.title: Welcome to FunAging Studio
hero.description: A vibrant community where elderly thrive with dignity, health, and happiness. Join us for enriching activities, safe trips, and compassionate care.

features.title: Why Choose FUN?
features.description: We provide comprehensive care and enriching experiences for elderly in a safe, joyful environment.

health.title: Health-Focused Care

safety.title: Safe & Secure
safety.description: Certified caregivers and staff with comprehensive safety protocols for complete peace of mind.

member1.name: Mrs. Sompong
member1.content: FUN has given me a new lease on life. The activities are fun, and I've made wonderful friends.

member2.name: Mr. Chai

member3.name: Mrs. Noi

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?

footer.tagline: Active Aging Ecosystem - A fulfilling life for the elderly

about.subtitle: Our Story
about.title: About FunAging Studio
about.description: Founded in 2020, FunAging Studio was created with a vision: to transform elderly care in Thailand by making it joyful, dignified, and health-focused.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.p1: We believe that growing older should be a celebration, not a limitation. At FUN, we empower elderly individuals to maintain their independence, health, and happiness through carefully designed activities, safe trips, and compassionate support.
mission.p2: Our team of certified professionals works tirelessly to create an environment where every member feels valued, engaged, and cared for. We partner with families to provide peace of mind while ensuring their loved ones thrive.

different.title: Why We're Different
different.point1: Elderly-First Design: Every program, space, and activity is designed specifically for elderly needs and abilities.
different.point2: Health Integration: We work with healthcare professionals to monitor and support each member's wellness journey.
different.point3: Cultural Respect: Thai values of family, respect for elders, and community are at the heart of everything we do.
different.point4: Transparent Communication: Families receive regular updates and can participate in care planning.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.description: The principles that guide our care and community

care.title: Compassionate Care
care.description: Every member is treated with dignity, respect, and personalized attention from our certified caregiving team.

safety.title: Safety First
safety.description: Comprehensive safety protocols, health monitoring, and emergency response systems ensure complete peace of mind.

community.title: Community Focus
community.description: We foster meaningful connections and social engagement through group activities and shared experiences.

excellence.title: Professional Excellence
excellence.description: Our staff holds certifications in elderly care, first aid, and specialized training in dementia and mobility support.

joy.title: Joy & Dignity
joy.description: We believe aging should be celebrated. Our programs promote happiness, independence, and quality of life.

wellness.title: Holistic Wellness
wellness.description: Physical, mental, and emotional health programs designed specifically for elderly needs and abilities.

certification.title: Certifications & Trust
certification.description: FunAging Studio is licensed by the Thai Ministry of Public Health and certified by the Elderly Care Association of Thailand. Our staff undergoes continuous training in safety, health monitoring, and compassionate care practices.

joinNowPage.title: Join FUN Studio
joinNowPage.description: Join the Active Aging family with intelligent OCR + QR Code system
joinNowPage.methodOcrDesc: Fast, convenient, no form filling + Special benefits
joinNowPage.methodManualDesc: Enter information manually, suitable for those without ID card
joinNowPage.benefit1: Auto-fill registration, no extensive form filling
joinNowPage.benefit2: Get 10% discount on your first trip
joinNowPage.benefit4: Access to VIP member exclusive promotions
joinNowPage.benefit5: Digital membership card with QR Code
joinNowPage.privacyDesc: Your data is encrypted and stored securely according to Thailand's PDPA standards. We will never disclose your personal information to third parties. Used only within our system to provide you the best service.
joinNowPage.uploadArea: Click to upload or drag and drop file here
joinNowPage.ocrNote: OCR system will automatically read data from ID card
joinNowPage.verifyNote: System has extracted data from your ID card. Please verify accuracy.
